item.title: Clown In A Cornfield Soundtrack Guide: Every Song & When They Play
item.description: Clown in a Cornfield hits a diverse array of musical genres over the course of its runtime with a soundtrack that perfectly matches each scene's vibe.

item.title: Even After Beetlejuice 2, There's Still 1 Detail About Lydia's OG Ending Scene That Bothers Me
item.description: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice answered a lot of our questions about the original movie, but it never explained one detail that still doesn't make sense.

item.title: Why Jeffrey Jones Doesn't Return As Charles Deetz In Beetlejuice 2
item.description: Though Beetlejuice 2 features several members of the Deetz family, Jeffrey Jones’ Charles isn't one of them, and it’s for an understandable reason.
